name: Spark Rising-- Build. Battle. Conquer.
blurb: Build fortresses, defenses, & creatures. Then engage in a 3 way war between mechs, dinos, & the undead!

rewards.reward: No Reward
EARLY BIRD TIER: You get a copy of our final game on PC or Mac! This is a limited quantity tier and is not considered part of any other tier. + Supporter Tier rewards

ALMOST EARLY BIRD TIER: Due to popular demand, it's back! Early Bird Round 2. You get a copy of our final game on PC or Mac! This is a limited quantity tier and is not considered part of any other tier. + Supporter Tier rewards
PLAYER TIER: You get a copy of our final game on PC or Mac! + Supporter Tier rewards
CO-OP TIER: You get an extra copy of the game so you can gift to your buddy to play co-op! + Player Tier rewards

BETA PRIME TIER:  You get Beta access to the game when it becomes available. In addition, you get a digital artbook, digital soundtrack, and digital wallpapers. Get a FREE copy of our game Munch Face on PC / Mac! + Co-op Tier rewards

ALPHA PRIME TIER: You get Alpha access to the game when it becomes available, so you can provide feedback and shape the design of the game. Get an exclusive exo-suit to use in battles. + Beta Prime Tier rewards
WICKED LOOT TIER: For all you loot lovers! You get an exclusive in-game pet of your choice, an exclusive loot booster item, and a big bonus chest of gold to start. + Alpha Prime Tier rewards

QUBICLE TIER: You get a copy of Qubicle Constructor! This Spark Rising special edition version of Qubicle is ultra limited (the comparable version normally sells for $40.) Create amazing voxel stuff, and then import it into our game. + Alpha Prime Tier rewards
T-SHIRT TIER: All new tier! You get our T-shirt. What does the T-shirt look like? We'll create several designs, and you can help pick out the best one! + Alpha Prime Tier + Qubicle Tier rewards

GRAY EGGS TIER: This special tier, inspired by an early backer, gets you special recognition in the game. It's an Easter Egg that other gamer have to discover. Let's have fun with this! + Wicked Loot Tier rewards
EARLY BIRD LOYAL FAN TIER: You get physical collector items: A limited edition t-shirt, hardcover artbook, and a voxel plushie. Get special recognition in the game credits. + Wicked Loot Tier rewards
LOYAL FAN TIER: You get physical collector items: A limited edition t-shirt, hardcover artbook, and voxel plushie. Get special recognition in the game credits. +  Wicked Loot Tier rewards

LOYAL FAN ROUND 2 TIER: Due to the popularity of the Loyal Fan Tier, we're creating a new tier for those who are a tad late to the game. You get physical collector items: A limited edition t-shirt, hardcover artbook, and voxel plushie. Get special recognition in the game credits. + Wicked Loot Tier rewards
SHRINE TIER: We create a special shrine for you in-game and all gamers can worship you for boosts. Get game design credit. +  Loyal Fan Tier rewards

VIP TIER: You can create something core to any game mode, whether a campaign objective, boss, or fortress. You design it, we'll make sure it looks ready for prime time! Get game design credit.   + Loyal Fan Tier rewards

VIP PRIME TIER: You can create something significant to any game mode, whether a campaign objective, boss, or fortress. You design it, we'll make sure it looks ready for prime time!  + Loyal Fan Tier rewards

STHUMP TIER: We are going to create a new exo-suit for everyone to play with. It can TRANSFORM like a Macross Robotech Suit Thingie. Thing. You can battle it out, and then transform and fly around. That sounds sweet as sh*t. Valkyries!

GREAT GUARDIAN TIER: You become the guardian of the last remaining planet in the galaxy! The last bastion of hope, peace, and prosperity. When people stop by, they will be greeted by you as you offer them challenges to complete. Completion of said challenges allows people to help grow the planet back to its once glorious bloom. And you can impart a double rainbow. And you get 10 copies of the game you can gift to friends + Loyal Fan Tier rewards

MASTERMIND TIER: You become the ultimate villain in the game! Every player must stop your galactic invasion in campaign mode, and feel your wrath as you unleash your war machines and creatures! You not only get game design credit, you are part of the game! And you get 10 copies of the game you can give to friends to gloat about your galactic conquest. + Loyal Fan Tier rewards
